choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:

Subject: Important Update - Leaving Company (Human)

Dear [Boss's Name], 
I hope this message finds you well! It is with a heavy heart that I must inform you of some difficult news. After careful consideration, it has been decided to part ways with the company at an earlier date than anticipated. As such, effective immediately, my last day will be on [Date]. This decision was not made lightly and we have enjoyed working together for many years. 
I want to assure you that I am leaving in good health and financial standing. The transition should take place smoothly without any disruption to the company's operations or projects currently underway. If there are any questions, concerns, or issues related to my departure please do not hesitate to contact me directly at [Phone Number] so we can discuss further. 
Thank you for your understanding during this time and I wish you all the best in your future endeavors!
